sentences.en: A clod of silt can easily be crumbled in the fingers.
sentences.cn: 手指能很容易把一块泥土粉碎.

sentences.en: Accumulations of trash and silt should be near the primary element.
sentences.cn: 泥砂和废料的淤积要逐渐靠拢基本元件.

sentences.en: Continued deposition of silt along the coast is crucial in counteracting the rise in sea level.
sentences.cn: 海岸边泥沙的不断沉积对于抑制海平面的上升起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.en: During the annual floods the river deposits its silt on the fields.
sentences.cn: 每年河水泛滥时都会在田野上沉积一层淤泥.

sentences.en: Each was a composite of three scoops of silt.
sentences.cn: 每个样品由三样勺河床淤泥组成.

sentences.en: Many rivers carry silt toward the equator.
sentences.cn: 许多河流带着泥沙流向赤道.

sentences.en: The channel is almost choked with silt.
The components to be considered in this book include boulders, gravel, sand, silt and clay.
sentences.cn: 本书所考虑的组成部分包括漂砾, 砾石, 砂, 粉土和粘土.

sentences.en: The lake was almost solid with silt and vegetation.
sentences.cn: 湖里几乎快被淤泥和植物填满了。

sentences.en: The river deposited silt at its mouth.
The river was in those days choked up with silt.
sentences.cn: 那时候这条河被淤泥阻塞着.

sentences.en: The sand is separated from the silt and clay by wave sorting.
sentences.cn: 砂粒在波浪分选作用下从粉砂及粘土中分出.

sentences.en: These may range from coarse silt to sand or peble size.
sentences.cn: 这些颗粒的大小变化范围,从粗粉砂级到砂级或细砂级.

sentences.en: These particles range from coarse silt to sand or pebble size.
sentences.cn: 这些颗粒的大小变化范围是从粗粉砂级到砂级或细砂级.

words.tran_cn: 淤泥，[地质]泥沙；煤粉；残渣

trans.tran_en: sand, mud, soil etc that is carried in water and then settles at a bend in a river, an entrance to a port etc
